bug.short_desc: Integrate new Locales CS, PT in Showcase

long_desc.thetext:
Translators have provided cs.po (Czech) and pt.po (Portugese) translations for the Showcase app, and I have added the locales to LOCALES in the config.
While most demos in the Showcase are not affected by this, the widgets used in the "Languages" demo react on locale changes. So if the locale is (or is set to) 'cs' or 'pt', those widgets reflect it immediately. But the integration with the demo is poor. There is no flag to deliberately switch to lose locales. Also, there are no sub-locales currently for those languages, so the correpsonding drop-down list would contain only one entry. I don't know if this breaks the pattern of this show case?!
So, should we add flags for those languages?!
